channel.title: Notes on Arrans github.io
channel.description: Recent content in Notes on Arrans github.io

item.title: toeverything/AFFiNE
item.description: There can be more than Notion and Miro. AFFiNE(pronounced [É™â€˜fain]) is a next-gen knowledge base that brings planning, sorting and creating all together. Privacy first, open-source, customizable and ready to use.

item.title: fccview/jotty
item.description: Lightweight but powerful alternative for managing your personal, file based, notes and checklists.

item.title: Smaug6739/Alexandrie
item.description: Alexandrie is a fast, modern, and open-source web application for Markdown note taking, designed for students, creators, and knowledge workers seeking a productive and flexible tool. Build structured notes using an extended Markdown syntax, organize them with workspaces and categories, and work seamlessly both online and offline.

item.title: pbek/QOwnNotes
item.description: QOwnNotes is a plain-text file notepad and todo-list manager with Markdown support and Nextcloud / ownCloud integration.

item.title: xournalpp/xournalpp
item.description: Xournal++ is a handwriting notetaking software with PDF annotation support. Written in C++ with GTK3, supporting Linux (e.g. Ubuntu, Debian, Arch, SUSE), macOS and Windows 10. Supports pen input from devices such as Wacom Tablets.

item.title: brufdev/many-notes
item.description: Markdown note-taking web application designed for simplicity
